name: Mahjong Classic·
description:
Mahjong is a tile matching game for one player. The goal of the game is to remove all tiles from the board by pairs.

Mahjong features:
- Gorgeous graphics, and rich sound effects.
- Hint, undo and shuffle board options.
- Big tiles.
- Easy to understand user interface with big buttons.

Instructions:
Select two tiles with the same picture and they will be removed. Only tiles which are non-covered may be removed. Tiles which may not be selected are gray.

Download this Mahjong game today!
